segments.source_content:
Project with Native Code Required

If you are using the managed Expo workflow there is only ever one entry component registered with AppRegistry and it is handled automatically (or through registerRootComponent). You do not need to use this API.

`AppRegistry` is the JS entry point to running all React Native apps. App root components should register themselves with `AppRegistry.registerComponent`, then the native system can load the bundle for the app and then actually run the app when it's ready by invoking `AppRegistry.runApplication`.

translations.zh-hant: `AppRegistry` 是所有 React Native 應用程式的 JavaScript 進入點。應用程式的根元件應透過 `AppRegistry.registerComponent` 註冊自身，之後原生系統便能載入應用程式的套件包，並在準備就緒時透過呼叫 `AppRegistry.runApplication` 實際執行應用程式。

segments.source_content: To "stop" an application when a view should be destroyed, call `AppRegistry.unmountApplicationComponentAtRootTag` with the tag that was passed into `runApplication`. These should always be used as a pair.

translations.zh-hant: 若要「停止」應用程式（當視圖需要銷毀時），請呼叫 `AppRegistry.unmountApplicationComponentAtRootTag` 並傳入當初執行 `runApplication` 時使用的標籤。這兩者應始終配對使用。

segments.source_content: `AppRegistry` should be required early in the `require` sequence to make sure the JS execution environment is setup before other modules are required.

translations.zh-hant: `AppRegistry` 應在 `require` 序列的早期階段引入，以確保 JavaScript 執行環境在其他模組引入前已完成設定。

segments.source_content: Only called from native code. Cancels a headless task.

translations.zh-hant: 僅由原生程式碼呼叫。取消無介面背景任務。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Description | | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | taskId
Required
| number | The native id for this task instance that was used when `startHeadlessTask` was called. | | taskKey
Required
| string | The key for the task that was used when `startHeadlessTask` was called. |

| Name | Type | | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------- | | enabled
Required
| boolean |

| Name | Type | | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | | appKey
Required
| string |
Register a headless task which can be cancelled. A headless task is a bit of code that runs without a UI.

translations.zh-hant: 註冊可取消的無介面背景任務。無介面任務是指不需使用者介面即可執行的程式碼片段。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Description | | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | taskKey
Required
| string | The native id for this task instance that was used when startHeadlessTask was called. | | taskProvider
Required
| [TaskProvider](appregistry#taskprovider) | A promise returning function that takes some data passed from the native side as the only argument. When the promise is resolved or rejected the native side is notified of this event and it may decide to destroy the JS context. | | taskCancelProvider
Required
| [TaskCancelProvider](appregistry#taskcancelprovider) | a void returning function that takes no arguments; when a cancellation is requested, the function being executed by taskProvider should wrap up and return ASAP. |

| Name | Type | | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- | | appKey
Required
| string | | componentProvider
Required
| ComponentProvider | | section | boolean |

| Name | Type | | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | | config
Required
| [AppConfig](appregistry#appconfig) |
Register a headless task. A headless task is a bit of code that runs without a UI.

translations.zh-hant: 註冊無介面背景任務。無介面任務是指不需使用者介面即可執行的程式碼片段。

segments.source_content: This is a way to run tasks in JavaScript while your app is in the background. It can be used, for example, to sync fresh data, handle push notifications, or play music.

translations.zh-hant: 此方法可讓應用程式在背景執行 JavaScript 任務，例如同步最新資料、處理推播通知或播放音樂。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Description | | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | taskKey
Required
| string | The native id for this task instance that was used when startHeadlessTask was called. | | taskProvider
Required
| [TaskProvider](appregistry#taskprovider) | A promise returning function that takes some data passed from the native side as the only argument. When the promise is resolved or rejected the native side is notified of this event and it may decide to destroy the JS context. |

| Name | Type | | ----------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | | appKey
Required
| string | | run
Required
| function |

| Name | Type | | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- | | appKey
Required
| string | | component
Required
| ComponentProvider |
Loads the JavaScript bundle and runs the app.

translations.zh-hant: 載入 JavaScript 套件並執行應用程式。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------ | | appKey
Required
| string | | appParameters
Required
| any |

| Name | Type | | --------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | | hook
Required
| function |
A valid `hook` function accepts the following as arguments:

translations.zh-hant: 有效的 `hook` 函式需接受以下參數：

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ | | component
Required
| ComponentProvider | | scopedPerformanceLogger
Required
| IPerformanceLogger |
The function must also return a React Component.

translations.zh-hant: 該函式必須回傳一個 React 元件。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | | ------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- | | provider
Required
| ComponentProvider |
Only called from native code. Starts a headless task.

translations.zh-hant: 僅由原生程式碼呼叫。啟動無介面任務。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | Description | | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | | taskId
Required
| number | The native id for this task instance to keep track of its execution. | | taskKey
Required
| string | The key for the task to start. | | data
Required
| any | The data to pass to the task. |
Stops an application when a view should be destroyed.

translations.zh-hant: 當視圖需銷毀時停止應用程式。

segments.source_content:
| Name | Type | | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------ | | rootTag
Required
| number |

| Name | Type | | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- | | appKey
Required
| string | | component | ComponentProvider | | run | function | | section | boolean |
> **Note:** Every config is expected to set either `component` or `run` function.

translations.zh-hant: > **注意：** 每個配置都需設定 `component` 或 `run` 函式。

segments.source_content:
| Name      | Type                                       |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| runnables | array of [Runnables](appregistry#runnable) |
| sections  | array of strings                           |

| Name      | Type              |
| --------- | ----------------- |
| component | ComponentProvider |
| run       | function          |
An object with key of `appKey` and value of type of [`Runnable`](appregistry#runnable).

translations.zh-hant: 以 `appKey` 為鍵、[`Runnable`](appregistry#runnable) 類型為值的物件。

segments.source_content: A `Task` is a function that accepts any data as argument and returns a Promise that resolves to `undefined`.

translations.zh-hant: `Task` 是一個接受任意資料作為參數，並回傳解析為 `undefined` 的 Promise 的函式。

segments.source_content: A `TaskCanceller` is a function that accepts no argument and returns void.

translations.zh-hant: `TaskCanceller` 是一個不接受參數且不回傳值的函式。

segments.source_content: A valid `TaskCancelProvider` is a function that returns a [`TaskCanceller`](appregistry#taskcanceller).

translations.zh-hant: 有效的 `TaskCancelProvider` 是一個回傳 [`TaskCanceller`](appregistry#taskcanceller) 的函式。

segments.source_content: A valid `TaskProvider` is a function that returns a [`Task`](appregistry#task).

translations.zh-hant: 有效的 `TaskProvider` 是一個回傳 [`Task`](appregistry#task) 的函式。
